interestingcomments.content: Just having a browse at trains to Lyon. The direct service avoiding Paris (greatly to be desired) doesn't run except on M, F, Sa in October, according to "The Man in Seat 61". So unless things change.... Grrh! Brian, You could take Eurostar from St Pancras International to Lille Europe and then a direct TGV service from Lille Europe to Lyon Part Dieu (about 3 hours). I'm likely to take the train and for me going through Paris is greatly to be desired. --img--  It'll give me an (admittedly weak) excuse to stay a night or two in Paris on the way there and back. Pete
